title: Develop Flight Software for a Satellite
description: A software engineer is developing the flight software that controls a satellite's attitude determination and control system (ADCS).

tasks.description: Write software code to read data from the satellite's sensors (star trackers, gyros).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes compliant and efficient code to interface with the sensors.

tasks.description: Implement a control algorithm (e.g., a Kalman filter) to process the sensor data and determine the satellite's orientation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly implements the complex control algorithm.

tasks.description: Test the software in a hardware-in-the-loop simulation to verify its performance before uploading it to the satellite.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the simulation and confirms the software can accurately and stably control the satellite's attitude.
